title: Start
body:
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"Okay, so you threaten the goblin. What do you say?"
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"I just rolled a 17 for it. Do I have to act it out?"
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"Come on, man, we've always done it like this!"
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"Yeah, it's more fun when we actually say it, right?"
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait You>>
->"Ah, I don't think we have to. Let's just keep this chill."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<increaseValue Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<decreaseValue Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Come on, guys; that really sucks the fun out of things."
    "It's supposed to be about being in the world."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "It's not a big deal, Lance."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    <<if $lance_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "Okay, fine. Whatever. The goblin says you can go through."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Alright, alright, you big sticklers."
        "But we'd better do some actual RP at some point."
    <<endif>>
    [[Node2]]
->"It is a big part of the fun."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    <<decreaseValue Allison>>
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<increaseValue Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    "Yeah, just give it a shot."
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Exactly, it's how the game works."
    "Ty, you get it."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "Alright, Lance, you've made your point."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Franklin, let's hear it. And put down your phone."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    <<if $franklin_is_very_pleased is true>>
        "Oh, yeah. Sorry. Let me put it away."
        "Okay, so..."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
        "Okay, okay."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Okay, okay."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "Fine."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
        "Fine."
    <<endif>>
    "Uh, 'Get out of here, or I'll smite you with the power of Moradin!'"
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    [[Node2]]

title: Node2
body:
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
<<if $lance_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "Okay, I go through the door."
    "Oh, wait. Actually let me check for traps first."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Good idea."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "I go in."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "I go in."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
    "I go in."
<<endif>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"You see the messenger you're looking for inside. He looks pretty beat up. It seems the goblins of the citadel have been torturing him quite a bit."
"He stands up wearily, dusting off his clothes. You notice he seems to be wearing mage robes."
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body--"
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "We get it. He's real beat up."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Alright, jeez."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_very_angry is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body--"
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "We get it. He's real beat up."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Alright, jeez."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
"When you let him out, he looks at you, Sir Frederick, and says, 'Thank you, thank you so much for the rescue!'
"'Now I must go. Sir knight, your lord father needs to hear a message of mine.'"
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"Okay, I let him go."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"Wait!"
"He should come with us for now. We need to protect him!"
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"We can't protect everyone we come across."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"But he's one of our friends! We should stay close to him."
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"He has something important to do. Let him go."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait You>>
->"If he's got work to do, then let him be."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<decreaseValue Ruby>>
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>

->"Come on, we have to look out for our friends."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<increaseValue Ruby>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    "Right!"
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    "What if that message is about an attack, or something?"
    "It could be really important."
    "Like, if he has to go, he has to go."
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Hey, is that your phone buzzing again?"
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    "Oh. Yeah, give me a sec. Just have to text someone..."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
